tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE policy_details (
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_owner_id INT,
  coverage_type TEXT,
  coverage_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE policy_details (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_name VARCHAR(50),
    coverage_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE coverage_info (
    coverage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_owner_id INT,
    coverage_type VARCHAR(50),
    premium_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE insured_property_owners (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE policies (
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  coverage_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  owner_id INT REFERENCES insured_property_owners(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)

CREATE TABLE policy_details (
  detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT REFERENCES policies(policy_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  property_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  property_value DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE coverage_types (
  type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  type_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE coverage_info (
  coverage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT REFERENCES policies(policy_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  type_id INT REFERENCES coverage_types(type_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  premium DECIMAL(8, 2) NOT NULL
)
